predictions.article: USDA Prepares to Protect Farmers in a Trade War
predictions.prediction: The USDA's Emergency Commodity Assistance Program (ECAP) will distribute up to $10 billion in direct economic assistance to agricultural producers by the end of April 2025.

predictions.article: US Farmers Face Higher Costs, Fewer Markets from Tariffs
predictions.prediction: U.S. soybean and sorghum exports to China will remain below 10% of their 2024 l
